plugins.name: syneidesis
plugins.description: Surface potential gaps at decision points — /gap (συνείδησις: knowing-together)

plugins.name: write
plugins.description: Multi-perspective blog drafting from session insights

plugins.name: hermeneia
plugins.description: Clarify intent-expression gaps through dialogue — /clarify (ἑρμηνεία: interpretation)

plugins.name: katalepsis
plugins.description: Achieve certain comprehension of AI work — /grasp (κατάληψις: a grasping firmly)

plugins.name: telos
plugins.description: Co-construct defined goals from vague intent — /goal (τέλος: end, purpose)

plugins.name: aitesis
plugins.description: Detect context insufficiency before execution — /inquire (αἴτησις: a requesting)

plugins.name: epitrope
plugins.description: Context-adaptive delegation calibration through scenario-based interview — /calibrate (ἐπιτροπή: a turning over to)
